name: Proto Tower 314
description:
Air Traffic Control (📡): 'Flight 314, this is Tower Control. You are approaching through heavy cloud cover. Please adjust heading to 270 degrees for runway alignment.'

Flight 314 (✈️): 'Tower Control, Flight 314 adjusting to 270 degrees. Visibility is near zero in these clouds.'

Air Traffic Control (📡): 'Acknowledged, Flight 314. Maintain current altitude and speed. We have a clear radar lock on your position.'

Flight 314 (✈️): 'Maintaining current altitude and speed. Good thing those radio towers were fixed last week, or we wouldn't be able to see a thing in these conditions!'

Air Traffic Control (📡): 'Absolutely, Flight 314. The repairs were timely. You're on a steady approach path. We'll guide you in.'

Flight 314 (✈️): 'Thanks, Tower. Relying on your guidance for a safe landing.'

Air Traffic Control (📡): 'You're in good hands, Flight 314. Prepare for landing instructions. Runway lights are fully operational and waiting for your arrival.'
